VALOR:
SELECT 
          (CASE 
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 30 THEN '0'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 38 THEN '1'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO IN(36, 40) THEN '6'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 45 THEN '9'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 41 THEN '3'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 43 THEN '8'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 49 THEN '4'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 47 THEN '7'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 51 THEN '12'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 53 THEN '14'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 55 THEN '13'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 57 THEN '15'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 59 THEN '17'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 61 THEN '18'
              WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = 73 THEN '55'
              ELSE '0,1,6,9,11,5,4,7,14,18,12,15,8,20,3' 
          END) T
  	FROM DUAL
